content:
Bay Club West Valley's lap swimming policies can affect your swimming experience, so it's essential to know the details.

According to Bay Club West Valley's website and staff, here's what you can expect:

**Lap Swimming Hours:**

* Monday to Friday: 6:00 AM - 8:00 AM, 12:00 PM - 1:00 PM, 5:00 PM - 7:00 PM
* Saturday and Sunday: 7:00 AM - 1:00 PM

**Lane Reservations:**

* Bay Club West Valley does not require lane reservations for lap swimming during regular hours. However, they do recommend checking the pool schedule in advance to ensure availability.
* During peak hours (usually morning and evening), they may divide the pool into lanes to accommodate multiple swimmers. You can expect to share a lane with other swimmers during these times.
* If you prefer a dedicated lane, you can reserve a lane in advance for an additional fee. This is usually available for an extra $10-$20 per hour, depending on the time of day and pool availability.

**Other Lap Swimming Policies:**

* Lap swimming is available on a first-come, first-served basis during regular hours.
* Swimmers are expected to circle swim (counter-clockwise) when sharing lanes.
* Kickboards, pull buoys, and other swim equipment are available for use during lap swimming hours.
* Lap swimming is restricted during water aerobics classes, swim lessons, and other programmed activities. These events are usually posted on the pool schedule in advance.

It's always a good idea to call ahead or check the Bay Club West Valley website to confirm their lap swimming hours, policies, and any schedule changes before heading to the pool.

Phone: (408) 266-4444
Website: [www.bayclubs.com/west-valley](http://www.bayclubs.com/west-valley)

I hope this information helps you plan your lap swimming sessions at Bay Club West Valley!
